description: This file defines a React component named 'Logo' which renders animated graphics using the Remotion library. It includes schema validation for color props and composes multiple 'Arc' components with animated properties.

classes.name: Logo
classes.description: A React functional component that renders a logo with animated arcs and a transforming atom based on video frame data.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: Main functional component applying animated transformations and rendering 'Arc' and 'Atom' components.
